tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct stringProperties.paymenttype as "Payment Type",CONDITION(COUNT(*), WHERE userExperienceScore="SATISFIED" and useraction.matchingConversionGoals="Activate") as "Satisfied Count",CONDITION(COUNT(*), WHERE userExperienceScore="TOLERATED" and useraction.matchingConversionGoals="Activate") as "Tolerated Count",CONDITION(COUNT(*), WHERE userExperienceScore="FRUSTRATED" and useraction.matchingConversionGoals="Activate") as "Frustrated Count",count(*) as "Total Count" FROM usersession where useraction.matchingConversionGoals="Activate" and stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL ${uspClause}

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"yyy-MM-dd HH:mm","1h") as "Start Time", usersession.stringProperties.paymenttype,CONDITION(count(*), where usersession.stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL and useraction.matchingConversionGoals="Activate") as "Count" FROM usersession where usersession.stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct usersession.stringProperties.airline,count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where useraction.matchingConversionGoals="Activate" and stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct browserFamily,count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where useraction.matchingConversionGoals="Activate" and stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL
